docs.text: Problem 1 import numpy as np import matplotlib.pyplot as plt Constants g = 9.81 # acceleration due to gravity (m/s^2) Function to calculate the range def calculate_range(v0, theta_0): # Convert angle to radians theta_0_rad = np.radians(theta_0) # Range formula return (v0* 2 * np.sin(2 theta_0_rad)) / g Initial velocity v0 = 20 # m/s Angles from 0 to 90 degrees angles = np.linspace(0, 90, 100) ranges = [calculate_range(v0, angle) for angle in angles] Plotting the range as a function of the angle plt.figure(figsize=(8, 6)) plt.plot(angles, ranges, label=f'Initial velocity = {v0} m/s') plt.title('Projectile Range vs Angle of Projection') plt.xlabel('Launch Angle (degrees)') plt.ylabel('Range (meters)') plt.grid(True) plt.legend() plt.show()
